content: Does the "Subscribe to more streams" link (bottom of the leftmost pane) work for others? I'm on Firefox on Linux and nothing happens when I click it.
Seems to work for me, I think, also firefox
It's broken for me, Zulip Desktop on macOS. Both that, and the + button on the top doesn't do anything.

My console has a suspicious exception:

Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'code' of undefined
    at stream_settings_ui.js:615
I went ahead and filed https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/19895. I'm not sure if that's the right place, but hopefully it helps.

Eric Seppanen said:

Does the "Subscribe to more streams" link (bottom of the leftmost pane) work for others? I'm on Firefox on Linux and nothing happens when I click it.

Works here, Firefox on Linux.
Thanks for the report! Looking into it...
